citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1109 on
04/11/2016. Inspectors were able to get ahold of a facility representative and he confirmed that no one was
available for inspection at that time.
Additional Inspectors
Campitelli D.V.M Kathryn, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1109 on
04/11/2016.  Inspectors were able to get ahold of a facility representative and he confirmed that no one was
available for inspection at that time.
Additional Inspectors
Campitelli D.V.M Kathryn, Veterinary Medical Officer
